About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Learning how to program has been the best career decision i've ever made. Working with computers allows for the perfect combination of logic and creativity. I feel like I am in a constant state of learning, and I always push myself to explore new technologies. I currently work as a Front End Engineer with a specialty in React, Redux, and CSS. I have experience on the backend as well, specifically with Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Postgres. If you need help building a website, or just want to chat, please feel free to contact me!
On a personal note, I am a huge basketball fan (both playing and watching). I also enjoy skiing and hanging out with my girlfriend and dog!
